"enable": "null", Enable Autodiscovery BGP
    : {
Route DistinguisherPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"addr-index": "string", Addr index

      
"as": "string", Two byte or 4 byte AS number

      
"address": "string", IPV4 address

      
"type": "string", Router Distinguisher Type

      
"as-index": "string" AS:nn (hex or decimal format)

    }
  }
}

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Neighbor IP addressPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"tag-impose": "string", Tag Impose vlan tagged mode
    : {
Pseudowire L2TPv3 static configuration
      
"enable": "null" Enable pseudowire L2TPv3 static\nconfiguration

    },
    : {
MPLS static labels
      
"remote-static-label": "string", Pseudowire remote static label

      
"local-static-label": "string" Pseudowire local static label

    },
    
"source-address": "string", Value of the Pseudowire source address.\nMust be IPv6 only.
    : {
L2TP Static Attributes
      
"l2tp-remote-session-id": "string", L2TP remote session ID

      
"l2tp-local-session-id": "string", L2TP local session ID
      : {
L2TP secondary local cookie
        
"lower-value": "string", Lower remote cookie value

        
"higher-value": "string", Higher remote cookie value

        
"size": "string" Remote cookie size

      },
      : {
L2TP local cookie
        
"lower-value": "string", Lower remote cookie value

        
"higher-value": "string", Higher remote cookie value

        
"size": "string" Remote cookie size

      },
      : {
L2TP remote cookie
        
"lower-value": "string", Lower remote cookie value

        
"higher-value": "string", Higher remote cookie value

        
"size": "string" Remote cookie size

      }
    },
    
"bandwidth": "integer", Pseudowire Bandwidth
range: "0..4294967295"
units: "kbit/s"

    
"neighbor": "string", Neighbor IP address

    
"class": "string", Name of the pseudowire class
    : {
List of pseudowires
      : [
No description
        {
          
"backup-pw-class": "string", PW class template name to use for the\nbackup PW

          
"pseudowire-id": "string", Pseudowire ID

          
"neighbor": "string", Neighbor IP address
          : {
MPLS static labels
            
"remote-static-label": "string", Pseudowire remote static label

          }
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}

                        },

}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

DATABASE - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/

Create operation of resource: database

a2_database_schema

databasebody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
L2VPN databasesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
List of G8032 RingPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          : {
Ethernet ring protection port0PUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"monitor": "string", Ethernet ring protection port1 monitor

                
"interface-name": "string" Name of the attachment circuit interface

              }
            ]
          },
          
"g8032-ring-name": "string", Name of the G8032 ring
          : {
List of ethernet ring protection instancePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"profile": "string", Ethernet ring protection instance profile

                
"erp-instance-id": "string", ERP instance number

                
"inclusion-list": "string", Associates a set of VLAN IDs with the G\n.8032 instance
                : {
Automatic protection switchingPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  
"level": "string", Automatic protection switching level

                  
"enable": "null", Enable attachment circuit interface

                  
"port0": "string", Port0 APS channel in the format of\nInterfaceName
                  : {
APS channel for ERP port1PUTPOSTDELETEGET
                    
"aps-type": "string", Port1 APS type

                    
"aps-channel": "string" Port1 APS channel in the format of\nInterfaceName, BDName or XconnectName

                  }
                },
                : {
Ring protection linkPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  
"role": "string", Role of the router target type

                  
"port": "string" ERP main port number

                },
                
"description": "string" Ethernet ring protection instance\ndescription

              }
            ]
          },
          
"exclusion-list": "string", Vlan IDs in the format of a-b,c,d,e-f,g\n,untagged

          
"erp-provider-bridge": "null", Ethernet ring protection provider bridge

          
"open-ring": "null", Specify the G.8032 instance as open ring
          : {
Ethernet ring protection port0PUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                : [

}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

DATABASE - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/

Delete operation of resource: database

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

DATABASE - Retrieve

GET Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/

Retrieve operation of resource: database

200 OK
a2_database_schema

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json
Response Example (200 OK)
